definition: live (e.g. broadcast or recording)/what is actually happening/scene/the real situation
live relay/broadcast of actual scene/to broadcast live

sentences.english: Nonprofits could use it to livestream video from events.
sentences.chinese: 非營利組織可以用它來進行公益事件的實況轉播。

sentences.english: The album was compiled from live recordings from last year's tour.
sentences.chinese: 這套唱片選輯由去年巡迴演出的實況錄音彙編而成。

sentences.english: The match will be broadcast live.
sentences.chinese: 這場比賽將作實況轉播。

sentences.english: Did you watch the live telecast of the World Cup last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚你看世界盃實況賽了嗎？

sentences.english: The comparison of a 24-hr wind forecast with the ship observations shows a satisfactory agreement.
sentences.chinese: 予報結果和實況相比是令人滿意的。

sentences.english: I watched on television as the second plane smashed into the South Tower.
sentences.chinese: 當第二架飛機撞上世貿南塔時我正在看電視實況。

sentences.english: A:Did you watch the live telecast of the World Cup last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚你看世界盃實況賽了嗎？

sentences.english: The distribution of soil moisture that was forecasted was as nearly same as that was measured.
sentences.chinese: 土壤溼度預報分佈規律與實況基本一致。

sentences.english: Live recordings of China's Shenzhou 7 Space Mission.
sentences.chinese: 中國神舟7號宇宙飛船的實況錄像。

sentences.english: We watched the football match on live show television.
sentences.chinese: 我們看了電視實況轉播的足球比賽。

sentences.english: We watched the football match on live television .
sentences.chinese: 我們看了電視實況轉播的足球賽。

sentences.english: This truly is a new dawn for Pro Evolution Soccer.
sentences.chinese: 這確實是一個實況足球新的曙光。

sentences.english: The opinions expressed in this commentary are solely those of Andrew Moore.
sentences.chinese: 這個實況報道中表達的觀點完全是安德魯個人的觀點。

sentences.english: Communication satellites permit the exchange of live television programs between nations and continents.
sentences.chinese: 通訊衛星能進行跨國或跨洲實況電視轉播。

sentences.english: Tom kept ups running commentary on the football game.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆對足球賽進行實況廣播報道。

sentences.english: The arrest of the two drug traffickers was broadcast live on the TV.
sentences.chinese: 緝拿兩名販毒分子的過程在電視上進行了實況轉播。

definition: broadcast/CL:個|个[ge4]/broadcasting/to broadcast/(formal) to propagate/to publicize
to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
to depart as quick as a flash/flash mob
